about_the_game:
This DLC is LIT!

DAB harder with 14 powerful new units, 3 amazing maps, and 2 super-effective new classes.



You DAB'd with the free edition and you want more. Way more.

You want to achieve more.

You want to rise faster in the ranks of your fellow Area 51 Raiders.

You want to showcase your creative defense builds even more.

You want to become "The Man" in our community.

And you want to utterly destroy the defenses with your swarms of AI memelords.



Well, this DLC for TCSAOU aims to give you just that and possibly

... make you more popular with the ladies.

... get you that huge promotion at work.

... give you A in that really annoying class.

Three Exclusive Maps

If you own the DLC you get access to exclusive maps which you can host, and your friends can play on even if they don't own the DLC!
  • Trenches (AvD)

    Attempting to slow down the enemy advance by building large entrenchments at key locations the defenders have been pinned to a peninsula between two rivers.


    As the attacker, you must now defeat this trapped animal, and as the defender, you must fight over what little land you have!

  • Town Square (AvD)
    The war increases in intensity as you move from the countryside to downtown.


    Fight in the town square of a once-thriving urban home. Close-quarters limited combat with only so many routes.

    Fire bullets back-to-back or send dense armies forward to claim the town as your own.

  • Braunschweig (Infinite Waves)


    This was once a quiet & peaceful city in Germany.

    Now as the war rages on the city is under siege by enemy forces.

    Battle at the outskirts of this great city and defend its name!

  • Voyager (AvD)
    Docked at a pristine space station, the ship Voyager finds itself being boarded by an unwelcome crew!


    Keep them from getting to the internal section of the ship by stopping them at the ship's hangar.

    The fate of the ship & her crew lies in your hands.

2 Brand New Attacker Classess
Exclusive Attacker Classes: With 14 new units and 2 vehicles, attempt to defeat your enemies in a whole new way!

Be a part of a new battlefield, taking the new places with new people!

fullgame.name: They Can't Stop All Of Us

name: They Can't Stop All Of Us - Supporter's Edition

package_groups.name: default

subs.option_text: They Can't Stop All Of Us - Supporter's Edition - $4.99

package_groups.title: Buy They Can't Stop All Of Us - Supporter's Edition

short_description: You DAB'd your enemies with the free edition and you want more. You've got to further express your defensive creativity, more effectively destroy your enemies, rise the ranks of our community, and possibly improve your real life. That's what this DLC is for.
